## `SetHistogramBinning`

Sets how data are binned in histograms\index{graphs!histograms} for new projects.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
SetHistogramBinning(BinningMethod method)
```

### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
| [`BinningMethod`](#binningmethod) method | How to bin the data. |
:::
